content: of 3dc round 6 insert your hook between 2 3dc-clusters chain 3 make 2dc in the space between clusters chain 1 *3 double_crochet in the next space ch1* repeat from *to* 22 more time slip_stitch into 3rd chain of initial chain-3 to join the round you ve got 24 clusters of 3dc round 7 insert your hook between 2 3dc-clusters chain 3 make 2dc in the space between clusters chain 1 *3 double_crochet in the next space ch1* repeat from *to* 22 more time slip_stitch into 3rd chain of initial chain-3 to join the round you ve got 24 clusters of 3dc pattern copyright © lusianne the colors ● joining before joining you may or may not weave in all the ends as you re going to felt the hot pad it s ok if you just let them take the recto and the verso face with the wrong sides facing each other insert your hook between 2 clusters of the recto face and in the middle stitch of a cluster on the verso face so there will be less holes in your finished object chain 2 and start a half_double_crochet round with no increase always insert the hook in one stitch from the verso and one stitch from the recto pattern copyright © lusianne the pattern is for unlimited personal and non commercial use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern at the end of the round slip_stitch into 2nd chain of initial chain-2 to join the round weave in the last ends pattern copyright © lusianne the pattern is for unlimited personal and non commercial use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern ● potholder version using the same color as for the joining round insert your hook in one stitch of this half_double_crochet round chain 18 slip_stitch into the same stitch from the joining round turn work make 1sc into each slip_stitch slip_stitch into the joining round weave in ends no you can hold it ● felting put it in your washing machine on a normal 40°c cycle if you never did this before you should test your machine cycle first with a swatch let it dry flat tadaaaam before and after felting with my washing machine pattern copyright © lusianne the pattern is for unlimited personal and non
